title: Top Places to visit in Yamunanagar, Haryana
content: Yamunanagar, previously known as Abdullahpur, is a city and a municipal corporation in Yamunanagar district in the Indian state of Haryana. This town is known for the cluster of plywood units and paper industries. It is also known for providing fine timber to larger industries. The older town is

title: Top Places to visit in Sonipat, Haryana
content: Sonipat, anciently named Swarnprastha, is a city and a Municipal Corporation in Haryana state of India. It comes under the National Capital Region and is around 20 kilometers (12 mi) from Delhi. It is also around 214 km(128 miles) southwest of Chandigarh, the state capital. The Yamuna River runs

title: Top Places to visit in Sirsa, Haryana
content: Sirsa is a city and a municipal council in Sirsa district in the westernmost region of the Indian state of Haryana, bordering Punjab and Rajasthan. It is located 260 kilometres north-west of New Delhi and 240 kilometres from state capital Chandigarh. Its history dates back to the time of Mahabhar

title: Top Places to visit in Rohtak, Haryana
content: Rohtak is a city and the administrative headquarters of the Rohtak district in the Indian state of Haryana. It lies 70 kilometres (43 mi) north west of New Delhi and 250 kilometres (160 mi) south of the state capital Chandigarh on NH 9(old NH 10). Rohtak forms a part of the National Capital Regio

title: Top Places to visit in Rewari, Haryana
content:
Rewari is a city and a municipal council in Rewari district in the Indian state of Haryana. It is located in south-west Haryana 82 km from Delhi  and 51 km from Gurgaon. Rewari may be considered centre of Ahirwal (Yadav) region.

title: Top Places to visit in Panipat, Haryana
content: Panipat, is a historic city in Haryana, India. It is 90 km north of Delhi and 169 km south of Chandigarh on NH-1. The three battles fought near the city in 1526, 1556 and 1761 were all turning points in Indian history. The city is famous in India by the name of "City of Weavers" and "Textile City

title: Top Places to visit in Panchkula, Haryana
content: Panchkula is a planned city and District Headquarter in the Panchkula district, Haryana, India. It forms a part of an adjoining area to the Chandigarh, Mohali and Zirakpur.
